name: Pacman Duet
description:
A variant of the classic arcade game, Pac-man. 

Orange has an annoying twin, Green. They hate each other and won't follow each other's direction. 

How much will you score with two pacman moving in opposite direction without getting eaten by the ghosts?

---------------------------------------

Navigate the twins

--> Up, Down, Left, Right arrow keys

Swap control

--> Space bar

---------------------------------------

Credits:

Pacman and map sprites from Zigurous, https://github.com/zigurous/unity-pacman-tutorial

Music and sound effects from http://www.orangefreesounds.com/ and https://freesound.org/
